extendedIngredients.name: canned black beans
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 can black beans, drained and rinsed*

extendedIngredients.name: chicken broth
extendedIngredients.originalString: 6-8 cups chicken broth (or vegetable or bullion or half water half broth, whatever is cheapest that week)
metaInformation: (or vegetable or bullion or half water half broth, whatever is cheapest that week)

extendedIngredients.name: garlic powder
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 Tbsp. garlic powder (or fresh garlic if you prefer)

extendedIngredients.name: lime juice
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 Tbsp. lime juice plus more for adding to the end
metaInformation: plus more for adding to the end

recipes.title: Elizabethâ€™s {ReadssRuns} Tortilla-Like Soup
recipes.instructions: Saute onion and jalapeno on medium heat in a bit of olive oil or whatever cooking oil you prefer until soft.Add all the spices and salsa and saute for a few minutes more.Add broth and chicken breast. Once the broth begins to simmer reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for at least 30 minutes. You want the chicken to cook through and be nice and moist.Remove chicken and shred. Add back to the soup and add the corn and beans. This is the perfect time to taste the broth and adjust the seasonings to your preference. Add lime juice.Cook for another 5-10 minutes.Ladle into bowls, add a dash of lime juice to each, and enjoy!Some topping ideas: Tortilla strips, avocado, cheese, or anything else you might enjoy!

steps.step: Saute onion and jalapeno on medium heat in a bit of olive oil or whatever cooking oil you prefer until soft.
Add all the spices and salsa and saute for a few minutes more.
Add broth and chicken breast. Once the broth begins to simmer reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for at least 30 minutes. You want the chicken to cook through and be nice and moist.
Add back to the soup and add the corn and beans. This is the perfect time to taste the broth and adjust the seasonings to your preference.
Add lime juice.Cook for another 5-10 minutes.Ladle into bowls, add a dash of lime juice to each, and enjoy!Some topping ideas: Tortilla strips, avocado, cheese, or anything else you might enjoy!
